text: King James Academy Royston (KJAR) is a through school located in Royston, Hertfordshire, England. It is an academy, and opened in September 2019, as a result of the merger of the town's two middle schools, Roysia and Greneway, and its Meridian upper school. The school is spread over 2 sites, with the Meridian site now being the Senior site and the Greneway site being the Junior site. ==References== ==External links== Category:Academies in Hertfordshire Category:Royston, Hertfordshire Category:Secondary schools in Hertfordshire Category:Educational institutions established in 2019 Category:2019 establishments in England
title: King James Academy Royston
